name: Project Phoenix
description:
Hey Guys,

This is my most recent game!

Project Phoenix is a bomb sent from the future, holding a deadly virus designed to wipe out 75% of all people on the world as to achieve world peace. Yet, someone from a parallel future also send a box with instructions, these are for stopping the bomb from exploding at all! It is your task to disarm the bomb before the timer of 25 minutes runs out!

For this project, I have had an amazing team working on the digital side of the prototype! The team consisted of Lisa Sijnstra(Me), Bogdan Arosculesei(Designer), Jullie-San Croes (Artist) and Eetu Lyytikäinen(Developer).

Just like my previous Augmented reality game, this game only works on android phones, as well as it is accompanied with a paper prototype, which I cannot send with you, unfortunately.

Feel free to fool around with what's there!
